text: [Music]
once upon a time they lived a beautiful

with it
tossing it around the princess came next
to a little pond and kept on playing

ribbit she looked around but could not

once upon a time they lived a king who
had twelve beautiful daughters
these twelve princesses lived all
together in a big beautiful room the
king protected his daughters with his
heart and when they went to bed at
nighttime he did not allow them to go
out
[Music]
but every morning they would wake up to
something very strange the shoes of the
princesses would all be worn out as if
they had danced all night long the King
had to buy his daughters new shoes every
day but the following days after the
shoes just kept wearing out Nenana King
noise men in the castle could solve the
mystery of the shoes how is this even
possible
Oh get a pair of shoes worn out like

can't understand finally the king said
whoever solves the mystery of my
daughter's shoes will get to marry
whichever daughter of mine he chooses
become my son-in-law and get to be the
king when I pass away but he has three

otherwise he will spend his life in
prison many young men in the kingdom in
even Prince's from other kingdoms came
to the castle for the job
four days they guarded the door of the

mystery and shoes continue to wear out

and so he made his way to the castle on

all the food he had in his bag to the
old lady
she was very happy because the previous

the old woman knew that this one was

be aware do not drink what the

when he was keeping guard in front of
the princess's room the oldest princess

he must be thirsty we have prepared some

the young man forgot about the old

he was very sleepy he fell asleep
snoring all night in their room that

[Music]
when it was morning the young man stood

the next morning when he woke up he

but be aware do not drink what the

a while later the king came next to the

princess
he chose the young man said that he

ever after once upon a time in a faraway
land lived a prince it was now time for
the prince to Wed but unfortunately his
princess was nowhere to be found in
order to find his princess he traveled
all around the world all the princesses
in the neighboring kingdoms visited the
king's castle to meet the prince
but the prince was having a hard time
trying to pick the right one his father
the King wanted his son to Wed a real
princess after trying for so many years
he lost all hope in finding the right
princess sad hopeless and deep in his
thoughts the Prince continued to live
his life the king and queen were indeed
very sad at the situation another sad
night as he sat there thinking a big
storm began lightning was striking and
the sound of the Thunder was echoing in
the castle
[Music]
the prince was having a hard time trying

strike from his window
[Music]
but on the other hand you couldn't help

I'm a princess from a faraway land my

is she a real princess or we will find
